derivation: apparently a middle voice of G2186 (ἐπίσταμαι) (with G3563 (ἐπίσταμαι) implied);
strongs_def: to put the mind upon, i.e. comprehend, or be acquainted with
outline:
1. to put one's attention on, fix one's thoughts on, to turn one's self or one's mind to, put one's thought upon a thing
    1. to be acquainted with, to understand
    2. to know
